```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
df = read.csv("data_driven_sdl_perm.csv")
```

```{r}
df_theory = data.frame(model = "nmf_theory",
  acc = c(0.8248337028824834, 0.9153132250580046, 1.0, 0.7716121495327103, 0.9351585014409222, 1.0, 0.7876376988984088, 0.8474099099099099, 1.0, 
                         0.8322510822510822, 0.8885906040268456, 1.0, 0.7983193277310925, 0.9183040330920372, 1.0, 0.8146718146718147, 0.8170426065162907, 1.0,
                         0.8114558472553699, 0.8665730337078652, 1.0, 0.8903743315508021, 0.8584070796460177, 1.0, 0.875234521575985, 0.9023904382470119, 1.0),
                       ca = rep(c("kura", "fca", "ghm"), 9), 
                       num_node = rep(c(rep(10, 3), rep(15, 3), rep(20, 3)), 3),
                       ntwk = c(rep("Caltech36", 9), rep('UCLA26', 9), rep('nws-20000-1000-05', 9)))
```

```{r}
df %>%
  #UCLA26, nws-20000-1000-05, Caltech36
  #filter(ntwk=="nws-20000-1000-05") %>%
  select(sdl_acc, rf_acc, base_acc, ca, num_node, ntwk) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c("sdl_acc", "rf_acc", "base_acc"), names_to = "model", values_to = "acc")%>%
  rbind(df_theory) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = num_node, y = acc))+
  geom_point(aes(col = model))+
  geom_line(aes(col = model))+
  facet_grid(ntwk~ca)


```
